title: BENTLEY_materials_planar_fill glTF Material Extension
description: Specifies planar fill behavior for CAD-style visualization.

wireframeFill.description: Specifies whether and when the interior fill is displayed in wireframe view mode. 0 = NONE (never drawn), 1 = ALWAYS (always drawn), 2 = TOGGLE (drawn when fill display is enabled).

anyOf.description: NONE - The fill is never drawn in wireframe view.
ALWAYS - The fill is always drawn in wireframe view.
TOGGLE - The fill is drawn only if the user or application has enabled toggleable fill display.

backgroundFill.description: If true, the fill should be drawn using the view's background color, creating an invisible masking polygon.

behind.description: If true, the fill should be drawn behind other coplanar geometry belonging to the same logical object, useful for mitigating z-fighting with overlaid geometry such as hatch patterns or text.
